landingPage.p: Create an event page, invite friends, and sell tickets. Host a memorable event today.

SignIn.title: Welcome to Luma
SignIn.subtitle: Please sign in or register below

OTPLogin.title: OTP Code
OTPLogin.subtitle: Please enter the OTP code sent to the provided email to sign in.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.subtitle: Choose how you will be displayed as a host or guest.
profile.name: Name
profile.bioPlaceholder: Share a bit about your interests, work, or hobbies.

emails.title: Emails
emails.subtitle: Add additional emails to receive event invitations sent to these addresses.

addEmail.title: Add Email
addEmail.subtitle: Add an additional email to receive event invitations sent to this address.
addEmail.label: Email Address

emails.mainEmailObservation: This email will be shared with hosts when you register for their events.
emails.emailObservation: Invitations sent to this email will be linked to your Luma account.

changeEmail.title: Change Email
changeEmail.subtitle: Change your primary Luma email address. This email is shared with hosts when you register for their events.
changeEmail.label: New Email Address

removeEmail.title: Remove Email
removeEmail.subtitleP1: Are you sure you want to remove

Phone.title: Phone Number
Phone.subtitle: Manage the phone number you use to sign in to Luma and receive SMS updates.
Phone.label: Phone
Phone.securityObservation: For your security, we will send a code to verify any changes to your phone number.
Phone.tooltip: Phone number linking disabled due to usage costs (note made by developer).

PasswordAndSecurity.title: Password and Security
PasswordAndSecurity.subtitle: Protect your account with a password and two-factor authentication.
PasswordAndSecurity.passwordObservation: Please set a password before enabling two-factor authentication.
PasswordAndSecurity.passwordObservationWithEmailSent: Please follow the instructions in the email to complete your password setup.
PasswordAndSecurity.twoFactorAuthObservation: Add an extra layer of security to your account with two-factor authentication.

ThirdpartyAccounts.title: Third-Party Accounts
ThirdpartyAccounts.subtitle: Link your accounts to sign in to Luma and automate your workflows.

AccountSync.title: Account Sync
AccountSync.calendarSyncObservation: Sync your Luma calendar with Google, Outlook, or Apple.

addiCalSubscription.title: Add iCal Subscription
addiCalSubscription.subtitle: Add the event feed to your calendar app to keep track of new events and updates.

AccountSync.syncAccountObservation: Sync your Luma account with other platforms to automate your workflows.
AccountSync.googleSyncObservation: Sync your Gmail contacts to easily invite them to your events.

ActiveDevices.title: Active Devices
ActiveDevices.subtitle: View the list of devices you are currently signed in to Luma on.

removeDevice.title: Sign Out from Device
removeDevice.subtitle: Do you want to sign out from this device and remove it from the list?

DeleteAccount.title: Delete Account
DeleteAccount.subtitle: If you no longer wish to use Luma, you can permanently delete your account.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete the account linked to
delete.checkbox: I understand that I will not be able to recover my account.

exhibition.title: Display
exhibition.subtitle: Choose your preferred Luma interface.
exhibition.languageObservation: This demo only has two language options

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Choose how you would like to be notified about updates, invitations, and subscriptions.

yourSubscriptions.title: Your Subscriptions
yourSubscriptions.subtitle: Choose which Luma discovery pages you want to follow and manage your calendar subscriptions.

noPages.title: No Discover Pages
noPages.subtitle: You are not following any Luma discovery pages yet.

noCalendars.title: No Calendars
noCalendars.subtitle: You are not subscribed to any calendars yet.
